THE FUND FOR ADULT EDUCATION
RECEIVED
ESTABLISHED BY THE FORD FOUI
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
APR 20 1354
91-4 EAST GREEN STREET
PASADENA I, CALIFORNIA
April 19, 1954
A M

?|8|9.tp|ll|12|l|2|3|4|5|C
i
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB, University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Skornia:
Thank you for your letter of April l4 regarding
your guarantee of a two-year contract for the position
of director of your Placement Service.
Your letter is being sent on to Mr. Griffiths in New
York for his attention.
Sincerely yours,
Secretary to
G. H. Griffiths
